com.salimov.yurii.dao.impl

Class CompanyDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.dao.impl.DataDaoImpl<Company,java.lang.Long>
      • com.salimov.yurii.dao.impl.CompanyDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDao, ContentDao<Company,java.lang.Long>, DataDao<Company,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.salimov.yurii.repository")
public final class CompanyDaoImpl
extends DataDaoImpl<Company,java.lang.Long>
implements CompanyDao
    The class implements a set of standard methods for working Company objects with a database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    CompanyDao, Company, CompanyRepository, DataDaoImpl
